name: Finance Company Overview Microapp Template
description:
Make your company story interactive


Showcase your company story to potential customers, partners, investors. Tell your story with this free template that includes an introduction of your company, mission and vision, case studies, team members and bios, testimonials, contact and documents attachments. With this template, you can easily swap your logo, add your brand colors and typography. Catch the attention of your audience by adding videos, embedding websites, image gallery, scrolling and interaction in Tiled. Publish and share your microapp in no time.


You can experience what your next company overview could look like here.


You can find the Tiled plugin here.
